about.title: About me
about.text:
Hi My name is Mauricio Felipe da Silva and I am currently focused on becoming a full-stack developer. I have always had an interest in the world of technology, so much so that I already had a channel in which I taught others to create banners, thumbnails, and how to use some functionalities in some applications and programs.

And when I met the world of web development through a friend, I immediately had the interest in the front-end part. Since then I started to study and create small projects that made me acquire even more knowledge and passion for the area.

Currently these are my main technologies:
